img_above_text:
![Wukong UpperHollow 25.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/0/0f/Wukong_UpperHollow_25.jpg)
Make your way to the end of the hanging cocoon passageway, and rush the Dragonfly Guai archer up ahead. There's another green Wisp to absorb along the ledge before heading into the next cave tunnel.
img_below_text:
Up ahead you'll find... more hanging cocoons, and yes, many of them hide Clawed Cocoons. Thankfully, the passage isn't as big, but it does hide a few Puppet Spiders to throw into the mix, so don't panic and dive into the middle of the group.
![Wukong UpperHollow 27.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/3/3f/Wukong_UpperHollow_27.jpg)

content.text:
You are given an image and related metadata and context.

            Image Position:
            - This is 27 from the file 'Webbed_Hollow_-_Upper_Hollow_Walkthrough.md'.

            Context:
            - Preceding Text: "![Wukong UpperHollow 25.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/0/0f/Wukong_UpperHollow_25.jpg)
Make your way to the end of the hanging cocoon passageway, and rush the Dragonfly Guai archer up ahead. There's another green Wisp to absorb along the ledge before heading into the next cave tunnel."
            - Following Text: "Up ahead you'll find... more hanging cocoons, and yes, many of them hide Clawed Cocoons. Thankfully, the passage isn't as big, but it does hide a few Puppet Spiders to throw into the mix, so don't panic and dive into the middle of the group.
![Wukong UpperHollow 27.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/3/3f/Wukong_UpperHollow_27.jpg)"

            Your task:
            1. Generate a **short, clear, and informative English summary** of the image.
            2. Focus primarily on the **preceding and following text** to infer the image's **purpose, content, or narrative role**.

img_summary: The image depicts a scene from the game "Black Myth: Wukong," showing the protagonist engaged in combat within a dark, web-filled cave. The character is seen using a glowing weapon or ability, likely to fend off enemies hidden in the hanging cocoons and Puppet Spiders mentioned in the surrounding text. This image serves to illustrate the intense and hazardous environment players will navigate, emphasizing the need for caution and readiness for sudden attacks.
